::DrillBit::

"Good. Leave a few bots here to deal with those two."
He opened a comm.
"This is DrillBit, to all my troops. Report to Hell Beasts base, and
help the Alliance take it over. This is the time for gloary!"
He turns back to DarkFate.
"Ready?"

::Dollen::

He hears the orders but must stay with the trading mission. He continues
to gather the things.
